SEARCH
Package com.group7.krisefikser.repository

Class StorageItemRepo

java.lang.Object
com.group7.krisefikser.repository.StorageItemRepo
@Repository public class StorageItemRepo extends Object
This class is a repository for managing storage items in the database. It provides methods to get, add, update, and delete storage items. It uses JdbcTemplate to interact with the database.

  • Method Details

    • getAllStorageItems

      public List<StorageItem> getAllStorageItems(int householdId)
      This method retrieves all storage items for a specific household from the database.
      Parameters:
      householdId - The ID of the household to retrieve storage items for
      Returns:
      A list of StorageItem objects.

    • getAllSharedStorageItemsInGroup

      public List<StorageItem> getAllSharedStorageItemsInGroup(long emergencyGroupId)
      This method retrieves all shared storage items for a specific emergency group from the database.
      Parameters:
      emergencyGroupId - The ID of the emergency group to retrieve storage items for
      Returns:
      A list of StorageItem objects.

    • getSharedStorageItemsInGroupByItemId

      public List<StorageItem> getSharedStorageItemsInGroupByItemId(long groupId, long itemId)
      This method retrieves storage items for a specific group based on item id and group ID.
      Parameters:
      groupId - The ID of the group to retrieve storage items for
      Returns:
      A list of StorageItem objects.

    • findById

      public Optional<StorageItem> findById(int id)
      This method retrieves a storage item by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the storage item to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the StorageItem object if found, or empty if not found.

    • findByItemId

      public List<StorageItem> findByItemId(int itemId, int householdId)
      This method retrieves storage items by their item ID for a specific household.
      Parameters:
      itemId - The item ID of the storage items to retrieve.
      householdId - The ID of the household the storage items belong to.
      Returns:
      A list of StorageItem objects of the specified item.

    • add

      public StorageItem add(StorageItem storageItem)
      Adds a new storage item to the database. This method inserts the storage item's details into the database and sets the generated ID on the provided storageItem object.
      Parameters:
      storageItem - The storage item to be added. It must contain expiration date, quantity, household ID, and item ID.
      Returns:
      The added storage item with the generated ID set.

    • update

      public StorageItem update(StorageItem storageItem)
      Updates an existing storage item in the database. Ensures the storage item belongs to the specified household.
      Parameters:
      storageItem - The storage item to be updated. It must contain the ID and the new details.
      Returns:
      The updated storage item.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.dao.EmptyResultDataAccessException - if no storage item is found with the given ID in the specified household.

    • deleteById

      public boolean deleteById(int id, int householdId)
      Deletes a storage item from the database by its ID, ensuring it belongs to the specified household.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the storage item to be deleted.
      householdId - The ID of the household the storage item belongs to.
      Returns:
      true if the storage item was deleted, false otherwise.

    • deleteByHouseholdId

      public int deleteByHouseholdId(int householdId)
      Deletes all storage items of a specific household from the database.
      Parameters:
      householdId - The household ID of the storage items to be deleted.
      Returns:
      The number of storage items deleted.

    • findExpiringItems

      public List<StorageItem> findExpiringItems(int days, int householdId)
      Retrieves storage items that are about to expire for a specific household.
      Parameters:
      days - The number of days within which items will expire.
      householdId - The ID of the household to retrieve expiring items for.
      Returns:
      A list of storage items that will expire within the specified number of days.

    • findByItemTypes

      public List<StorageItem> findByItemTypes(int householdId, List<String> itemTypeStrings)
      Retrieves storage items by item type for a specific household. Uses a JOIN query to filter at the database level.
      Parameters:
      householdId - The household ID of the storage items to retrieve.
      itemTypeStrings - The types of items to filter by (lowercase strings).
      Returns:
      A list of StorageItem objects matching the criteria.
